about.label: About Me
about.value: I am a data-driven UI/UX designer with over 4 years of experience creating intuitive, functional, and user-focused design solutions that drive business growth. I've worked on and also led design and development teams across diverse industries, including e-commerce, recruitment, telco, telemedicine, edtech, freelancing, and logistics. I am always open to feedback and eager to learn.

responsibilities: Led, managed & trained the UI/UX design team, taking ownership of the design process from concept to execution.
Performed requirement analysis, prepared software design specifications and ensured alignment between client needs and technical implementations in an agile scrum environment.
Developed information architecture and partnered with backend teams to create system designs and database models.
Handled the majority of design decisions, designing UIs, including wireframes, prototypes, and design systems for brands.
Worked closely with the frontend team, including creating design guides, design reviews, and code reviews.
Conducted usability testing and manual QA testing, providing detailed reports for continuous improvement.
Conducted client demonstrations and played an instrumental role in recruiting for the UI/UX and Frontend development teams.
Managed and oversaw the design process of B2B and B2C systems across industries, including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, e-commerce, and recruitment management.
Led the UI/UX design of the projects, managing end-to-end product design processes across multiple products.
Took a hands-on approach in designing responsive UIs and prototypes while leading product decisions.
Conducted user research to inform design strategy, translating insights into high-quality design solutions.
Defined requirements for frontend teams, collaborated on system design and development, and led product demonstrations for clients.
Managed design deliverables for B2C and B2B platforms in sectors like e-commerce, telemedicine, freelancing, and education.
Involved in software testing and documentation (requirement analysis, design documentation, user guides, etc.)
Designed UI/UX for software products, iterating based on client feedback and user research.
Managed design decisions from system wireframes to final interface designs for various applications.
Contributed to system design and collaborated on data models for client projects.

activities: Served as Class Representative for four years

Volunteered in organizing college events as a council member
